text: Best wait for Agape’s feedback because EOC was making revisions to content

elements.text: Best wait for Agape’s feedback because EOC was making revisions to content

text:
The World Health Organization (WHO) has started using the phrase _*"physical distancing*_" instead of "social distancing" as a way to prevent the spread of the novel coronavirus from people to people, a move widely welcomed by experts as a step in the "right direction".
At a daily news briefing on March 20, officials of the global health body said while maintaining a physical distance was "absolutely essential" amid the global pandemic, "it does not mean that socially we have to disconnect from our loved ones, from our family."
